results.content: As a new student to Udemy I spent a bunch of time browsing until I came across this course. I have always wanted to learn web development but always found that getting started was a daunting task. This course however was perfect for me and any other beginner out there who has considered web development in my opinion. The instructor is very knowledgeable and does a wonderful job of breaking down the learning process step by step in a concise manner that is easily understood by someone with little to no experience like myself. I truly felt like i was learning and improving upon my skills with each step. I no longer feel like learning web development is a daunting task and I even feel confident in my ability to challenge myself to grow my skills further. I will definitely keep an eye on this instructor for any future courses they may release! I strongly suggest for anyone considering the course to pull the trigger you wont regret it!

results.content:
As a newcomer to Web Development, I found this course perfect to match my beginner level. 
Other courses I've tried often get above my head quickly, but the presenters clear and well spoken instructions made it easy for me to follow along.

I also liked the lesson times allocated for each course, making it easy to return to any stage in process to catch up if required. 

All in all, a great intro course for those just getting familiar with Web development protocols!
